\Aura\View

\Aura\ViewAbstractTemplate

Provides an abstract TemplateView pattern implementation. We use an abstract so that the extended "real" Template class does not have access to the private support properties herein.

setPaths()

setPaths(array $paths) : void

Sets the search paths for templates; paths are searched in FIFO order.

Parameters

array $paths

An array of directory paths where templates are.

addData()

addData(array $data) : void

Merges new data with the existing template data.

Parameters

array $data

An array of key-value pairs where the keys are template variable names, and the values are the variable values.

Tags

None found

setData()

setData(array $data) : void

Replaces all template data at once; this will remove all previous data.

Parameters

array $data

An array of key-value pairs where the keys are template variable names, and the values are the variable values.

find()

find(string $name) : string

Returns the path to the requested template script; searches through $this->paths to find the first matching template.

Parameters

string $name

The template name to look for in the template path.

Returns

string —

The full path to the template script.

abstract

Tags

None found

partial()

partial(string $name, array $data) : string

Fetches the output from a partial. The partial will be executed in isolation from the rest of the template, which means `$this` refers to the *partial* data, not the original template data. However, helper objects are shared.

Parameters

string $name

The partial to use.
array $data

Data to use for the partial.

Returns

string

abstract
